header.title: We Value Your Feedback
header.description: Help us improve MyLibrary by sharing your thoughts, reporting bugs, or suggesting new features.

success.title: Thank you!
success.message: Your feedback has been submitted successfully. We'll review it soon.

error.title: Error
error.message: Please fill in all required fields before submitting.

form.title: Share Your Feedback
form.emailHelper: We'll only use this to follow up on your feedback
form.feedbackPlaceholder: Tell us about your experience, report a bug, or suggest improvements...

items.name: Alex
items.feedback: Love the new button variants! Could we get a loading state for buttons?

items.name: Sarah
items.feedback: Card component spacing issue on mobile devices. Fixed in latest update!

items.name: Mike
items.feedback: Excellent documentation and examples. Makes integration super easy!
